title: Just played a ranked game and it did not count
body: i played a ranked game and won , i was at 44LP and the end screen did not come up only skip waiting for stats thingy , i clicked it then , the client started getting buggy , could not start another game , same thing happened to my premade , and when i tried to re log in , i got a RECONNECT  button and when i click it it tells me i DC and THE GAME IS DONE , WHERE IS MY GAME RIOT GAMES ? I DIDNT JUST WASTE 30MINS ON NOTHING I WANT MY LP I AM CRYING FOR A FREAKING WIN

replies.body:
Your game stats should update as soon as the match is over, so it's alright if you skip the post-game screen!  It does sound like you're having a pretty serious connection issue though, and if left unchecked, can continue to accrue losses of the match and LP.  I highly recommend going over every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and fix up that instability.

Until that's completely, I don't suggest playing another ranked game at the risk of another loss.  Let me know if you have any questions!
